bichromate.factories

Class osInformationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • bichromate.factories.osInformationFactory

  • public class osInformationFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Demonstrates osInformationFactory() - Main class to navigate all OS access. This allows Bichromate to run on Linux, Mac, Windows

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    davidwramer

      • setFilePath

        public java.lang.String setFilePath(java.lang.String path)
        This function Demonstrates setFilePath(). This function takes a path and changes the \ or / based on specific OS There is no need to change properties file path names when running on different OS.

        Parameters:
        path - path to be checked
        Returns:
        newPath of the correct path for the current OS
